report.title: Samples list for a CMS user
report.description: A general purpose list of samples filtered according to the ID of the user when logged into the content management system.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 INNER JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id INNER JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=s.sample_method_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS User ID' ) ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(ttl2.id AS character varying)='#sample_method_id#' OR '#sample_method_id#'='' OR t.term='#sample_method_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND CAST(sav.int_value AS character varying)='#user_id#' #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, su.title as survey, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, l.code, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the CMS user

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
